TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AspNetHostingPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetHostingPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class AspNetHostingPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type AspNetHostingPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls access permissions in ASP.NET hosted environments.

span.span: Controls access permissions in ASP.NET hosted environments.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类结合使用代码访问安全性以帮助保护 System.Web 命名空间中的公共类型。The class is used in conjunction with code access security to help protect public types in the System.Web namespaces. 代码必须分配至少信任级别，以访问受保护的 ASP.NET 类。Code must be assigned at least the trust level to access protected ASP.NET classes. 类的属性设置的配置元素中配置适当的信任级别。The class's property is set by configuring the appropriate trust level in the configuration element. 默认情况下`level`的属性`trust`配置元素设置为`Full`。By default, the `level` attribute of the `trust` configuration element is set to `Full`. 也就是说，默认情况下，ASP.NET 应用程序下运行级别。That is, by default, ASP.NET applications run under the level. 创建 ASP.NET 应用程序域时，ASP.NET 会读取为指定的值`level`的属性`trust`配置元素创建的实例类与指定属性，并然后将类添加到为应用程序域设置的权限。When an ASP.NET application domain is created, ASP.NET reads the value specified for the `level` attribute of the `trust` configuration element, creates an instance of the class with the specified attribute, and then adds the class to the permission set for the application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). 建议您设置`level`的属性`trust`配置元素`High`的受信任的站点。It is recommended that you set the `level` attribute of the `trust` configuration element to `High` for sites that are trusted. 对于不受信任，如 Web 服务器托管的外部客户从运行的代码的站点的站点，建议您设置`level`的属性`trust`配置元素`Medium`。For sites that are not trusted, such as a Web server that hosts sites that run code from an external customer, it is recommended that you set the `level` attribute of the `trust` configuration element to `Medium`. 默认情况下为.NET Framework （例如，LocalIntranet、 Internet，等） 定义的权限集不包括权限。The permission sets that are defined by default for the .NET Framework (for example, LocalIntranet, Internet, and so on) do not include the permission. 即仅分配权限，则默认情况下运行的应用程序下`Full`信任。That is, the permission is only assigned, by default, to applications that are running under `Full` trust. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用保护类权限。The following code example shows a class protected using the permission. 代码必须至少运行具有权限为了创建类的实例。Code must be running with at least permission in order to create an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.AspNetHostingPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.AspNetHostingPermission/CS/CustomAspNetClass.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.AspNetHostingPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.AspNetHostingPermission/VB/CustomAspNetClass.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关格式设置的权限对象状态的 XML 表示形式的详细信息，请参阅[实现自定义权限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3d0416b-7a3d-4074-9263-c7d6cd815585)。For details about formatting the XML representation of permission object state, see [Implementing a Custom Permission](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3d0416b-7a3d-4074-9263-c7d6cd815585).
